bug.short_desc: Line types are missing from package
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: It's only possible to draw continuous lines. It's not possible to draw dashed, dotted, etc. type lines.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): qcad-3.16.5.0-1.fc25.x86_64
How reproducible: 100%
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Open QCAD. 2. Click on the 3rd drop-down in the tool bar that says "By Layer".
Actual results: It has a choice for "continuous" but other expected line types are missing.
Additional info:
It appears that the "linetypes" directory is missing from the rpm. See also:
https://github.com/qcad/qcad/tree/master/linetypes

(In reply to Antonio Trande from comment #1) > Please, try this build: > https://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/taskinfo?taskID=18218098
Works for me.
